title: Define project scope and requirements
description: Gather and document requirements for the SafeSpaceConversationSimulator, including target audience, use cases, and desired features.

title: Design system architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for VR environment, feedback scenarios, user interactions, data storage, and integration with existing systems (if applicable). Consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability aspects.

title: Develop VR environment
description: Implement the VR environment, including 3D models, lighting, and user interactions.

title: Implement feedback scenarios
description: Develop the feedback scenarios, including dialogue systems, character animations, and branching logic.

title: Design database schema
description: Design the database schema for storing user data, feedback scenarios, simulation results, and other relevant data entities.

title: Implement data storage and retrieval
description: Develop the backend components for storing and retrieving data from the database.

title: Develop user authentication and authorization
description: Implement user authentication and authorization mechanisms to ensure secure access to the application.

title: Set up continuous integration and deployment
description:
Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the application. The pipeline should include the following stages:

1. Code checkout and build
2. Unit and integration testing
3. Static code analysis
4. Security scanning
5. Performance testing
6. Deployment to staging environment
7. Smoke testing in staging
8. Deployment to production environment

The pipeline should be configured to automatically trigger on code commits to the main branch. Additionally, it should support manual triggers for deploying specific versions to staging or production environments.

title: Create testing strategy and test cases
description: Develop a comprehensive testing strategy and write test cases for different components and scenarios, including unit tests, integration tests, end-to-end tests, and performance tests. Consider testing the VR environment, user interactions, feedback mechanisms, and data storage. Ensure test coverage for edge cases, error handling, and accessibility.

title: Write user documentation
description: Create user guides, tutorials, and other documentation to help users effectively use the SafeSpaceConversationSimulator.
